explains: adj. 忧郁的，阴沉的；<非正式>差劲的，糟糕的
wordGroup: dismal science 忧郁的科学；悲观科学

sentences.en: The Dismal Scientist, a webzine dedicated to economic news, is fun.
sentences.cn: 经济新闻网络杂志《忧郁科学家》趣闻十足。

sentences.en: Those were very long and dismal winter evenings!
sentences.cn: 那些是多么漫长而阴沉的冬夜啊！

sentences.en: The singer gave a dismal performance of some old songs.
sentences.cn: 那歌手唱了几首老歌，唱得不怎么样。
